title: The Chicken "truesight"
body:
does it reveal champions like Talon in their Ult?

Say you are running mid and Talon Ults to go in on your laner, if you run past an enemy ward activating your chicken buff, do you then get to see Talon?

replies.body: I'd assume so but don't ever call the Raptors chickens again.
So i need to change my name to BrbDoingChickens?
I don't know, maybe you should SPLIT push,.,
